strings: <voice_0x01001C36><se_low>Morrie: I have the news for you.
<voice_0x01001C37><se_low>Morrie: As you know, it was always my dream to find the true fighting MAESTRO with the skill to conquer even me.

<voice_0x01001C38><se_low>Morrie: But this is not the only purpose of the arena.
No no.
<voice_0x01001C39><se_low>Morrie: As the proprietario, it is my duty to keep the PASSION and the GUSTO alive in my pit!
<voice_0x01001C3A><se_low>Morrie: That is why I invite you to take part in my competizione. That day when we first met, I see in your eyes that you will bring the PASSION to my pit!
<voice_0x01001C3B><se_low>Morrie: And you never disappoint me! No, you do everything I ask <endash> everything I hope for.
<voice_0x01001C3C><se_low>Morrie: But now, the spettatori, they want more. More excitement. More stimolazione. More PASSION!
<voice_0x01001C3D><se_low>Morrie: Allora, this is why I decide to find more combattenti <endash> to fill my pit with the new talent.

<voice_0x01001C3E><se_low>Morrie: Si, you are understanding me already, ay?
I want YOU to fight these new combattenti.

<voice_0x01001C3F><se_low>Morrie: I make all the preparativi already.
The stage, it is set... The die, it is cursed...
The whales, they are emotion!
<voice_0x01001C40><se_low>Morrie: I revile to you...the Monster Arena...RANK X!
<voice_0x01001C41><se_low>Morrie: All the combattenti I find are truly formidabili, with the skills to match even yours. Si, great things are in stores now.

<party_order1_M_or_F_voice_0x01001C42><se_low>Morrie: So, <IF_MALE>champione<ELSE_NOT_MALE>championessa<ENDIF_MALE>! Show us what you are making of, ay? Bring my pit alive again with your GUSTO and your PASSION!
